properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 7 at 2:51PM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 10 to 20 kt and
seas 10 to 12 feet at 12 seconds. For the Gale Watch, north
winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 11 to 16 feet
at 11 seconds possible. For the Hazardous Seas Watch, very
steep and hazardous seas 20 to 25 feet at 17 seconds possible.

* WHERE...All areas for the Small Craft Advisory. Gales possible
for areas beyond 20 NM from shore south of Blanco with Small
Craft Advisory conditions elsewhere. All areas for Hazardous
Seas Watch.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM PST Thursday.
For the Gale Watch, from late Wednesday night through Thursday
morning. For the Hazardous Seas Watch, from Friday afternoon
through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
